ModMetaData.name: LMC063.基因工程植物
ModMetaData.author: XeoNovaDan
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Current Version: v1.3.3 (17th October 2018) Adds some lore-friendly crops to the game, including the rocketree mentioned in the cryptosleep revival briefing. 添加了四种经过基因改良后的植物，包括枝蔓植物、燃料树以及两种根茎植物。
